channel.title: Help, Look, a weird problem,
channel.description: hey, someone help me, i turn my server everyday one but i need to portforward everyday, cuz when i shut down my comp then my port lock and i need to portforward again to do my server on, How I portforward only one time and it shall work forever? btw im using utorrent,

item.title: Help, Look, a weird problem,
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

well ok another way they didnt list was make a new connection, but put it as a dynamik network adress. you have a router SO you have a network have yur network admin setup a new conection to the network MAIN pc and have a similar ip adress to the pc. if you make a new conection and delte old one. you can ip-config and it should come up with the true ip,dns,default gateway,subnet. or yopu need to access the conection to networks cd key which strted your network to get a 100% working ip,etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, Look, a weird problem,
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Thats nothing to do with portforwading, thatâ€™s your ip address. You currently have a dynamic ip address, that mean it changed every time you restart your router. You need to get a static ip, there is a tutorial on portforward.com

Hope this helps

~Johno

Read full topic
